main_definition: Emirates is a term related to the United Arab Emirates, an Arab country located in the Middle East.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to the United Arab Emirates (UAE), a federation of seven emirates.
meanings_and_examples.example: The UAE has a diverse economy, with Dubai and Abu Dhabi being two prominent cities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an emirate or ruler (emir), particularly in the context of the UAE.
meanings_and_examples.example: The UAE President is known as the 'Supreme Commander' and holds power similar to that of an emir.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to air travel, often referring to Emirates Airline, one of the largest and most well-known carriers.
meanings_and_examples.example: I prefer flying with Emirates because of their excellent service and comfort.
